content.description:
A very unique cave climb for the Barton Creek area. 

 There is a bunch of loose stuff in the back of the cave, don't pull it, every hold you need is solid.

 Start on the right hand wall near the back of the cave on a low jug. Make a move right then lean back and grab a pocket on the wall behind you. Continue to traverse out of the cave. The crux is orientating yourself so that your back is facing out so you can pull the lip of the cave.  When you can stand over the lip with both hands off your done.
content.location: It starts in the back of the cave and ends over the cave's entrance.

content.description: Home to the Backdoor cave and the Backdoor spring this is a beautiful and secluded spot to visit. Sharp pockets are the name of the game out here.
